2. Look at the pom.xml or build.gradle to understand the current setup
3. Update the Java version configuration
4. Check for any JDK 8 specific code that needs updating
5. Run `mvn clean verify` to ensure everything works with JDK 17

Let's start!

This is a common issue when migrating from Java 8 to Java 17. The compiler plugin is trying to access internal JDK classes that are now encapsulated by the module system. Let me update the parent pom.xml to fix this:

Text replacement complete and details displayed in console.
File: /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_min_20260129/sharping/pom.xml
Replaced 1 occurrence
Old string:     <properties>
        <java.version>1.8</java.version>
        <maven.compiler.source>${java.version}</maven.compiler.source>
        <maven.compiler.target>${java.version}</maven.compiler.target>
        <spring.boot.version>2.1.4.RELEASE</spring.boot.version>
        <hibernate.jpa.2_1.api>1.0.2.Final</hibernate.jpa.2_1.api>
    </properties>
New string:     <properties>
        <java.version>17</java.version>
        <maven.compiler.source>${java.version}</maven.compiler.source>
        <maven.compiler.target>${java.version}</maven.compiler.target>
        <maven.compiler.release>${java.version}</maven.compiler.release>
        <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
        <spring.boot.version>2.7.18</spring.boot.version>
        <hibernate.jpa.2_1.api>1.0.2.Final</hibernate.jpa.2_1.api>
    </properties>
Now let's update the build plugins section to add the maven-compiler-plugin with proper configuration and update the surefire plugin version:

Replaced 1 occurrence
Old string:     <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.0.0-M3</version>
                <configuration>
                    <includes>
                        <include>**/*UT.java</include>
                        <include>**/*IT.java</include>
                    </includes>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </build>
New string:     <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.11.0</version>
                <configuration>
                    <source>${java.version}</source>
                    <target>${java.version}</target>
                    <release>${java.version}</release>
                    <encoding>${project.build.sourceEncoding}</encoding>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.0.0-M7</version>
                <configuration>
                    <includes>
                        <include>**/*UT.java</include>
                        <include>**/*IT.java</include>
                    </includes>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </build>

**Summary of changes made:**

1. **Parent POM (pom.xml):**
   - Updated `java.version` from `1.8` to `17`
   - Added `maven.compiler.release` property set to `17`
   - Added `project.build.sourceEncoding` property set to `UTF-8`
   - Updated Spring Boot version from `2.1.4.RELEASE` to `2.7.18` (compatible with Java 17)
   - Added explicit `maven-compiler-plugin` configuration with version 3.11.0
   - Updated `maven-surefire-plugin` from 3.0.0-M3 to 3.0.0-M7
   - Updated `maven-javadoc-plugin` from 3.0.0 to 3.5.0 with Java 17 compatibility settings

2. **Spring Data API Changes:**
   - Removed deprecated `Specifications` class usage in `MultiInput2SpecificationConverter.java`
   - Simplified `SpecificationHelper.java` by removing reflection-based code that accessed internal Specifications classes
   - Added `withPage(int)` method to `OffsetLimitRequest.java` (new required method in Pageable interface)
   - Added `exists(Specification)` method to `SelectableRepositoryImpl.java` (new required method in JpaSpecificationExecutor)
   - Updated Sort API usage from `new Sort()` constructor to `Sort.by()` static method

3. **Removed JDK 8-specific dependencies:**
   - Replaced `javafx.util.Pair` with a custom Pair class in `OperatorsUT.java` (JavaFX removed from JDK 11+)
   - Fixed incorrect Nashorn import in `User.java`, replaced with proper Lombok annotations

4. **Added missing dependencies:**
   - Added Lombok dependency to `sharping-spring-suite-boot/pom.xml` test scope

The codebase now compiles and runs successfully with JDK 17, maintaining backward compatibility where possible while adapting to the newer Java and Spring Framework APIs.
